task_category_description_kitchen: For a helping hand in the kitchen
task_category_description_tidying: For cleaning and tidying the house
task_category_description_behaviour: For teaching good behavior and etiquette
task_category_description_web: For children to learn to surf smart
task_category_description_garden: Done outside the house and in the garden
task_group_description_cooking: 5 fun cooking tasks that can lead to a total reward of 19 kr per week
task_group_description_cleaning: 5 smart tasks that can lead to a total reward of 15 kr per week
task_group_description_pet: 3 good tasks that can lead to a reward of 9 kr per week
task_group_description_play: 7 inspiring tasks that can lead to a reward of 11 kr per week and 80 kr over time
task_group_description_school: 3 nice tasks that can lead to a total reward of 8 kr per week
task_group_description_web: 2 quite strict tasks that can lead to a total reward of 5 kr per week
task_group_description_strict: 5 tasks that can lead to a deduction of 17 kr per week but also a reward of 50 kr over time
task_template_description_clean_room: Put things away and clean up
task_template_description_set_table: Put out plates, cutlery, glasses and make it look nice
task_template_description_trash: Take the bag out of the bin and throw away
task_template_description_profanity: Said swear words or used bad language
task_template_description_candy: Didn't eat any sweets all week
task_template_description_empty_dishwash: Empty the dishwasher so that it can be filled with dirty dishes again
task_template_description_put_away_groce: Help put away groceries and put them in the fridge
task_template_description_dinner_plan: Try to stick to the dinner plan
task_template_description_do_dishes: Wash up anything that is in the sink
task_template_description_table_manners: Sit properly, use a knife and fork and don't play with food
task_template_description_gather_for_don: Gather things that we can give away
task_template_description_loppis: Set up your own garage sale where you sell things that aren't used anymore
task_template_title_selling_stand: Set up your own selling stand
task_template_description_selling_stand: Sell something to others on the street
task_template_description_pant: Collect bottles and boxes. You get money recycling them
task_template_description_gym_bag: Prepare your gym bag the day before you have gym class
task_template_description_skipped_class: Didn't go to class even though you should have
task_template_title_phone_at_dinner: Used phone at the dinner table
task_template_description_not_cleaned: If the room isn't cleaned once per week
task_template_description_fight: If you fight with your siblings, at school or with mum and dad
task_template_description_wash_car: Wash the car and clean the inside
task_template_description_late_sleep: If you went to sleep later than agreed
task_template_description_make_bed: Make the bed neatly and fluff the pillows
task_template_description_immigrants: Gather things that we can donate
task_template_description_help_pet: Go for a walk of at least ten minutes
task_template_description_get_mail: Collect the post and put it on the table
task_template_description_collect_wash: Collect dirty laundry and put it in the laundry basket
task_template_description_empty_litter: Empty litter tray and tidy up
task_template_description_tuck_siblings: Put your baby sister/brother to bed
task_template_description_shovel_snow: Shovel the driveway and around the car
task_template_description_news_paper: Put it on the dinner table
task_template_description_clean_play: Put away toys and tidy up
task_template_description_get_night_sibl: Put a younger sibling to bed
task_template_description_snowman_mounta: Make a snowman with eyes and a nose. Take a picure of you standing next to it.
task_template_description_wood_mountain_: Build a tower with firewood, as high as possible. Take a picture of the tower.
task_template_description_angel_mountain: Lay down in the snow and make a snow angel by moving your arms and legs. Then take a picture of the angel.
task_template_title_junk_mountain_specia: Pick up rubbish and throw away
task_template_description_junk_mountain_: Find rubbish and throw it in the nearest bin, take a picture of when you're throwing it away.
task_template_description_dish_mountain_: Help to do the dishes after dinner and take a picture.
task_template_description_dressup_easter: Gather some friends and do Easter dress up.
task_template_description_egg_easter_spe: Gather the family and/or friends and paint Easter eggs.
task_template_description_leaves_easter_: Help out with raking the leaves.
task_template_description_breakfast_surp: Surprise your parents with a lovely breakfast!
task_template_description_treehouse: Build a treehouse outside with friends or siblings.
task_template_description_handstand: Do a free handstand or up against a wall. Ask an adult for help.
task_template_description_hide_and_seek_: Gather a group of friends and play hide and seek!
goal_group_description_general: Do you want a new computer or an airboard to cruise around the city on? Here's a list showing what other kids want most right now! The percentage shows how popular the products have been during 2017.
goal_group_description_trending: What is the coolest thing to have right now? Here you have the list of the hottest gadgets among children right now. The percentage shows how much the products have grown during 2017.
goal_group_description_tips: The Micro Managers is a group that helps make our app better. Here are their own favourite gifts for Christmas.
goal_group_description_game: Do you also like to play the latest video games? Here's the list showing the most popular games among children right now!
goal_group_description_year_5: Ho ho ho! Here you can see what most 5-8 year olds hope to find under the Christmas tree.
goal_group_description_year_9: Do you wish you had a new smartphone or maybe a pair of nice headphones to listen to music? Here's a list showing what 9-12 year olds would most like to have right now.
goal_group_description_year_13: Do you want nice clothes, a new computer or a camera for Christmas? Check out want 13-16 year olds want most right now below.
task_group_description_perhour: Fun tasks you get paid hourly for
task_template_description_read: Read as many pages of a book as you can
task_template_description_wardrobe: Pack up summer clothes and get your winter clothes out
task_template_description_homework_help: Help your siblings with their homework
task_template_description_gather_laundry: Collect dirty laundry and put in the laundry basket
task_template_description_change_bedshee: Make the bed and put the dirty sheets in the laundry basket
task_template_description_empty_trashbin: Take the bag out of the bin and throw it away
task_template_description_fold_laundry: Sort, fold and put everything in the wardrobe
task_template_description_ironing_clothe: Iron clothes and put them back in the wardrobe
task_template_description_laundry_day: Collect, wash and put clothes back in the wardrobe
task_template_description_make_breakfast: Put breakfast on the table for the family
task_template_description_match_socks: Match all socks and put them in the wardrobe
task_template_description_vacuum_home: Hoover all floors of the house
task_template_description_walk_pet: Take the pet for a walk
task_template_description_water_plants: Water all the plants at home
task_template_description_clean_bathroom: Put things away and clean up
